name: SPANX SPANXshape Shaping Mid-Thigh Tight-End Tights – Level 3 Shaping – Core Control Shapewear – Comfortable Shaper Design
product_description: Meet the SPANX Tight-End Tights-a revolutionary undergarment that seamlessly blends support with style. With a built-in mid-thigh shaper, these tights are designed to flatten your stomach, firm your butt and smooth your thighs. Plus, with luxe yarns, the Tight-End Tights offer all-day comfort and style. The soft, dig-free waistband is gentle and comfortable. The Tight-End Tights offer level 3 shaping, feeling like a firm hug. The comfortable mid-thigh shaper flattens your core, lifts your butt and smoothes your thighs. The open cotton gusset makes panties optional and eliminates visible panty lines. Step into your Tight-End Tights and step out into the world with confidence. Tight-End Tights fit true to size. Hand wash warm. Only non-chlorine bleach when needed. Line dry. Do not iron. SPANX is a brand for women, by women. So, we understand what it feels like to be everything, to everyone, all at once-and needing clothes that can do the same. Our pieces are designed to effortlessly adapt to your busy lifestyle, ensuring you feel confident and comfortable-no matter the occasion. Because we firmly believe when you feel your best, you do your best; Don’t Worry…We’ve Got Your Butt Covered.

name: EVERSWE Girls Semi Opaque Footed Tights, Microfiber Tights
product_description: EVERSWE Microfiber colored tights are durable and neat on the legs. These tights come in a variety of fashion colors; and are great sellers. These tights can be used in performances or any occasion. Made using 3D Spandex (where spandex is knitted in to every row, rather than the usual every other row), to give a better fit which will stretch evenly in all directions as you move. 3D elastane also makes the tights more durable and gives a beautifully soft, suede like finish. They have a slight sheen which will make legs look polished and well dressed, they offer an exceptionally soft feel coupled with a great fit. We think these opaque tights are super quality and value for money and are great for format events, schools, dance or daily wear.

name: HUE Women’s Opaque Sheer to Waist Tights 40 Denier Soft High Waist Pantyhose
product_description: Step into confidence with these classic, wardrobe-essential tights. Designed for women who want 40 denier coverage from waist to toe, these tights deliver a smooth, flattering look with plenty of stretch for all-day comfort. Built with advanced 18-point fit technology, they provide an ideal contoured fit across the hips, waist, and legs — so they move with you without sagging or slipping. The sheer-to-waist design gives uninterrupted coverage under skirts and dresses, while a high waist ensures a sleek line under fashion or office wear. Perfect for everyday styling or special occasions, these tights blend comfort, durability, and timeless polish.

name: EVERSWE Women's 80 Den Soft Opaque Tights, Women's Tights
product_description: These tights come in a variety of trendy colors; and they are big sellers. These tights can be used in shows or any occasion. Made from 3D spandex (where spandex is knitted in each row, rather than the usual every other row), to give a better fit that will stretch evenly in all directions as you move. The 3D elastane also makes the tights more durable and gives a wonderfully soft suede finish. They have a slight sheen that will make your legs shiny and well dressed and, for the price, offer an exceptionally soft feel coupled with a great fit. We think these opaque tights are of great quality and affordable and are ideal for formatted events, schools, dance or everyday wear.
